name: 2D Vector Game -Ongoing Project
description:
This project is ongoing, Uploading it here to get some feedback and eventually come to a point of 20 Min of playable demo. 

This is still in the idea stage, meaning that I'm still planing on how to do some things. All feedback is welcome and I hope that you like the demo. 

I'm planing on updating the game file at least once every two months, not so often because I'm still learning some stuff and like everyone have my own life. This is a hobby project.
